com.TennisApp.java.persistance

Class LeagueDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.TennisApp.java.persistance.LeagueDao

  • public class LeagueDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the database access object class for the League entity. It will perform various CRUD operations, to Create, Read one or many, Update, and Delete Leagues in the TennisApp. Additionally, it will provide methods for the LeagueSearchServlet.java to use a LeagueSearch object lookup to the database. // http://www.developer.com/db/using-criteria-in-hibernate-for-advanced-queries.html Created by Dave on 11/11/2015.
